summary: "The Young and the Restless" (Y&R) is an American TV soap opera that started in 1973. It's set in a fictional town called Genoa City. Originally, it focused on the Brooks and Foster families, but over time, new families like the Abbotts and Newmans were introduced. The show has won 11 Daytime Emmy Awards and is the most popular daytime drama on TV. It has aired over 12,500 episodes and will continue until at least 2028. Famous actors like Eva Longoria and David Hasselhoff have appeared on the show.
title: The Young and the Restless
